newsitem.title: USA: Laser Storm to open laser tag arenas.
newsitem.headline: Laser Storm to open laser tag arenas.

text.p: Laser Storm said on Tursday that its strategy will focus on opening company-owned "stores," or arenas, where participants play laser tag.
The company said it will de-emphasize system sales, where it sells to others the systems and equipment needed for setting up the arenas.
According to the company, all of the "stores" it opened in 1996 are already operating profitably.
Laser Storm said that it has eliminated positions related to system sales and expects to save about $500,000 in 1997 from staff reductions.
